name: nativescript-3dtouch
description: Use 3D Touch to create quick actions for your home screen icon.

scripts.demo.ios.emulator: npm run preparedemo.ios && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator --device "iPhone 6s"
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo.ios && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo.android && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo.android: npm run build.android && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-3dtouch && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.preparedemo.ios: npm run build.ios && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-3dtouch && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
